title: Ivanovo, Sokolsky District, Vologda Oblast
text:
Ivanovo () is a <a href="types%20of%20inhabited%20localities%20in%20Russia">rural locality</a> (a <a href="Village%23Russia">village</a>) in Chuchkovskoye Rural Settlement, <a href="Sokolsky%20District%2C%20Vologda%20Oblast">Sokolsky District</a>, <a href="Vologda%20Oblast">Vologda Oblast</a>, Russia. The population was 13 as of 2002.
Geography.
Ivanovo is located 90 km northeast of <a href="Sokol%2C_Vologda_Oblast">Sokol</a> (the district's administrative centre) by road. Pavlovo is the nearest rural locality.
